The site of the outliner (PageSite) returns null. I think this shouldn't be the
case.
Moving to platform for comments. Move back if site.getShell can be null so I add
null checks in our code

Strange.  Neither the site nor the shell should be null.  The shell can't have 
been disposed or the outline view would have been disposed as well.
Are you using detached views or anything?
Which VM are you using?
Can it be reproduced under the debugger?
Reassigning bugs in component areas that are changing ownership.
